pr_title: Introduce CimCharacteristics extension and use in CGMES import

timeline.message:
Introduce new extension CIMCharacteristics

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

tmp

Add XML Serializer

Use extension in CGMES import

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Use extension in CGMES import

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText: A drawback of using here the expected exception annotation is that it doesn't ensure that the exception is thrown by the call which you expect will throw the exception (if create() throws a PowsyblException the test remains passed)
timeline.author: flo-dup

timeline.bodyText: I think that you should call your extension it CimCharacteristics. For CGMES, we in general choose Cgmes instead of CGMES. What do you think ?
timeline.author: annetill
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@

+ * @author Miora Ralambotiana <miora.ralambotiana at rte-france.com>

replies.bodyText: You're right, I will change it
